tool.name: PanCancer_compare_within_models
tool.help:
Pancancer_Aberrant_Pathway_Activity_Analysis scripts/compare_within_models.R:
--within_dir String of the Directory location of where pan within cancer-type data is --pancan_summary String of the Directory location of where pan classifier summary is --alt_gene String of the Directory location of classifier summary for alt gene
Output: - Process PanCancer Classifier and within disease/cancertype summary files and generate AUROC and AUPR comparion files ("auroc_comparison.pdf" and "aupr_comparison.pdf") - Process altgene classifier summary and altgene within disease/cancertypes summary files and process pancan_alt_summary file to determine alternative classifier prediction performance on alternative gene ("alt_gene_auroc_comparison.pdf" and "alt_gene_aupr_comparison.pdf")
